javadoc:
NOTE:  ALL GhidraScriptProvider CLASSES MUST END IN "ScriptProvider".  If not,
 the ClassSearcher will not find them.

methods.name: deleteScript
methods.comment: Deletes the script file and unloads the script from the script manager.

return.comment: true if the script was completely deleted and cleaned up

methods.javadoc:
Returns a description for this type of script.
@return a description for this type of script
methods.name: getDescription
methods.comment: Returns a description for this type of script.

return.comment: a description for this type of script

methods.name: getExtension
methods.comment:
Returns the file extension for this type of script.
 For example, ".java" or ".py".

return.comment: the file extension for this type of script

methods.name: getScriptInstance
methods.comment: Returns a GhidraScript instance for the specified source file.

params.name: writer
params.comment: the print writer to write warning/error messages

return.comment: a GhidraScript instance for the specified source file

methods.name: createNewScript
methods.comment: Creates a new script using the specified file.

throws.comment: if an error occurs writing the file

methods.name: getCommentCharacter
methods.comment:
Returns the comment character.
 For example, "//" or "#".

methods.name: writeHeader
methods.comment:
Writes the script header. 
 Include a place holder for each meta-data item.

methods.javadoc:
Writes the script body template.
@param writer the print writer
methods.name: writeBody

name: GhidraScriptProvider
comment:
NOTE:  ALL GhidraScriptProvider CLASSES MUST END IN "ScriptProvider".  If not,
 the ClassSearcher will not find them.
